snippet: The toll from attacks by the American-led coalition on Friday included at least nine children, a rights group reported on Saturday.
abstract: Syrian Observatory for Human Rights says that airstrikes led by American-led coalition against Islamic State killed 52 civilians in Bir Mahli, Syria; United States disputes claim.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: The toll from attacks by the American-led coalition on Friday included at least nine children, a rights group reported on Saturday.

headline.main: Strikes on Syria Tied to Deaths of 52 Civilians
headline.print_headline: Strikes on Syria Tied to Deaths of 52 Civilians

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
